description.default: textarea with parameter value with a char_limit of `20`
textarea with parameter value set to 'default testing' by default
textarea with parameter value set to '""'
textarea with parameter value set to 'null'
textarea with parameter value set to 'undefined'
textarea with placeholder text 'Enter a string'
textarea with error when set to 'error'
textarea with warning when set to 'warn'
Type 'error' in `Standard` column to show an `error`. Type 'warn' in `Additional` column to show an `warn`
textarea error handling for long strings
